## Scrapbook
### 1953
 The scrapbook contains assorted newspaper articles, magazine cuttings, letters, and drawings about Gypsies and their way of life, recieved by Robert Dawson in November 1997.  G Bramwell Evens was also known as 'Romany of the BBC'.
